Never look for small imprints again

Dec 3, 2016

Recently i decided to learn about WebExtensions an API to develop Browser Extensions for firefox and chrome. In my opinion the best way to learn a new technology is by solving a real world problem. One real world problem i had was often having to look for really small imprint links on websites.

The documentation for WebExtensions is really well written, so it was quite easy to get going. My ImprintFinder Extensions works with just a little bit of regex black magic:

The full project is on github so check it out or even better try to make your own little WebExtension.
